content:
As an AI language model, I don't have specific knowledge of the latest fashion trends or emerging brands, but I can suggest some growing and upcoming athleisure wear brands that offer unique designs and styles:

1. Girlfriend Collective - focuses on sustainable and ethically-made activewear made from recycled plastic bottles and fishing nets.

2. Aday - offers versatile and multifunctional activewear suitable for both workouts and everyday wear.

3. Year of Ours - specializes in retro-inspired activewear, including biker shorts, sports bras, and oversized sweatshirts.

4. Nagnata - a high-end Australian brand specializing in knitwear-based activewear.

5. Koral - offers activewear and athleisure wear with edgy and unique designs, featuring mesh, cutouts, and more.

Remember to always read product reviews before purchasing anything to ensure quality and reliability. Also, keep in mind that upcoming brands may have limited availability and may not have a wide range of sizes, so make sure to check their size charts before buying.
